title: I’ve Become A Holy Knight, But The Commander’s Breasts Are Too Amazing To Cleanse My Soul - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manga   Determined Protagonist   Fantasy World   Hard-Working Protagonist   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Male Protagonist   Polygamy
author: Kinome   木の芽
description:
Did you know? How titties sway every time you swing them? 

Aspiring to become a sword saint, Ruga was chosen to join the Order of the Holy Knights because of his sincerity and swordsmanship. He was assigned to the 6th Order, which is rumored to be “hell”.

Ruga was prepared for a grueling mission, but instead, he met the beautiful, busty leader of the order, Leon Myrie. 

Welcome, Ruga, as the only male Holy Knight in the Sixth Order. 

Turn to the right and you’ll see big tits! Turn to the left and you’ll see beautiful women everywhere! Can Ruga’s rational mind withstand the absolute inevitability of knighthood (harem)?>
